doc.short_description: Swap_pair: A function swap odd and even bits in an integer with as few instructions
doc.full:
Swap_pair: A function swap odd and even bits in an integer with as few instructions
as possible (Ex bit and bit 1 are swapped, bit 2 and bit 3 are swapped)

For example:
22: 010110  --> 41: 101001
10: 1010    --> 5 : 0101

swap_pair.source_code:
def swap_pair(num):
    odd = (num & int('AAAAAAAA', 16)) >> 1
    even = (num & int('55555555', 16)) << 1
    return odd | even
